Uses of Interface
bricker.brick_strategies.CollisionStrategy

  • Packages that use CollisionStrategy 
    Package Description
    bricker.brick_strategies
    The 'bricker.brick_strategies' package contains a suite of collision strategy classes made for a brick's game.
    bricker.gameobjects
    The 'bricker.gameobjects' package is an assemblage of classes that form the core interactive components of a brick-breaking game.

    • Uses of CollisionStrategy in bricker.brick_strategies

      Classes in bricker.brick_strategies that implement CollisionStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BasicCollisionStrategy
      BasicCollisionStrategy implements the CollisionStrategy interface to provide a basic response to collisions in the game.
      class  CameraChangeStrategy
      CameraChangeStrategy extends BasicCollisionStrategy and focuses on altering the camera's focus to the ball upon collision.
      class  DoublePowersStrategy
      DoublePowersStrategy is a collision strategy class extending BasicCollisionStrategy.
      class  ExtraBallsStrategy
      ExtraBallsStrategy is a specialized collision strategy that extends BasicCollisionStrategy.
      class  ExtraLifeStrategy
      Strategy for granting an extra life upon collision.
      class  ExtraPaddleStrategy
      ExtraPaddleStrategy is a collision strategy class that extends BasicCollisionStrategy.
      Methods in bricker.brick_strategies that return CollisionStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CollisionStrategy FactoryCollisionStrategy.chooseStrategy​(int behaviour)
      Chooses and returns a specific collision strategy based on the provided behavior code.
      private CollisionStrategy DoublePowersStrategy.createRandomStrategy​(FactoryCollisionStrategy behaviorFactory)
      Creates and returns a random collision strategy based on the game's current state.

    • Uses of CollisionStrategy in bricker.gameobjects

      Fields in bricker.gameobjects declared as CollisionStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private CollisionStrategy Brick.collisionStrategy  
      Constructors in bricker.gameobjects with parameters of type CollisionStrategy 
      Constructor Description
      Brick​(danogl.util.Vector2 topLeftCorner, danogl.util.Vector2 dimensions, danogl.gui.rendering.Renderable renderable, CollisionStrategy collisionStrategy, danogl.util.Counter bricksCounter)
      The Constructor for a single brick object with an uniq strategy power.
